<div class="col2">

^1^ *ʿnḫ nṯr nfr*  
*ḫnty ȝḫ.t*  
*ʿnḫ r-ȝw=f*  
*psḏ tȝ.wy *  
*m [...] wḏȝ.ty=*^2^*f*    
*ḥr.t [...]*  
*Ỉwn ỉnỉ [nṯ]r.t(?)*  
*wnn.t [ḥr].tw*  
  
^1^ Live the good god,   
foremost of the Akhet,   
he who lives entirely,    
the two lands shine  
from the [....] of his eyes,    
the sky [...]  
Iun-pillar, who brings the [god]ddess(?)   
who had been [far] away.

</div>

<div class="col2">

^3^ *ʿnḫ nṯr nfr*  
*[ḏ].t=f ẖ.t=f *  
*[...]=sn r=f nḥḥ*  
*ḏ.t pw *  
*wn=f ỉm=f*  
*m swḥ* ^4^ *n [ʿnḫ?]*  
*mn m [...]*  
*ḥr [...]=f*  
*ỉỉ [...]*  
  
^3^ Live the good god,  
[ev]ening and morning,  
they [...] towards him forever,    
that means for linear eternity,    
he exists in there,   
as the breath ^4^ of [life?]  
which endures in [...]  
upon [...] his [...]  
who comes [...]  

</div>
